task.title: Deleting or Restoring a Workspace
task.shortdesc: You can delete a workspace of your creation and restore the original version of a predefined workspace or one created by the administrator.

taskbody.prereq: To delete or restore a workspace, your user ID must have Workspace Author Mode permission.

context.p: Marvel Enterprise Portal features enable you to create and edit your own workspaces. You can also edit predefined workspaces and those created by the system administrator (unless they are protected).
